title: Risen 3 Titan Lords PC full game Multi6 + DLC  ^^nosTEAM^^
description:
How to play:
- Download
- Place where ever you want 
- In the folder "Risen 3 Titan Lords PC full game Multi6 + DLC ^^nosTEAM^^" go to the folder "system" and start the game with "Risen3"
- Play 

Included DLC:
 - Fog Island
 - Uprising Of the Little Guys
 - Adventure Garb
You can change game language in file /Risen 3 Titan Lords/data/ini/ConfigDefault.xml
Search for SubtitleLanguage="English" and change to one of other available languages: French,Italian.Spanish,German,Polish.

Enjoy the game and after download seed. Thanks!
